overview: Truly stunning, these 14k white gold emerald cut diamond halo stud earrings are a classy addition to any jewelry collection. Weighing 0.90 carats the center emerald cut diamond is surrounded by a halo of pave set round diamonds, creating a symmetrical beauty.
name: VINTAGE ROUND CUT DIAMOND EARRING JACKETS (0.22CT)

overview: A total of 10 colored gemstones alternating with 13 brilliant-cut round sparkling diamonds to form this vintage style blue sapphire and diamond engagement ring with wedding band. The diamond and blue sapphire engagement ring set showcases a total of 1.80 carats.
name: BUTTERFLY DIAMOND ENGAGEMENT RING (0.20CT)
